Text: thx but not works for me, when i try to add certificate it says "the certificate is invalid (2001D)"
sorry on 2nd try it WORKS, program succesfully activated now.

Works perfectly for Windows 7 64Bit. Thanks for the great up.

(Follow the install instructions to the letter and you will not have any problems)

You can stop Directory Opus from calling home and invalidating your certificate with the following commands (as administrator):

route -p add 67.228.213.247 mask 255.255.255.255 
route -p add 203.34.202.11 mask 255.255.255.255 

Replace  with your local IP such as 192.168.1.2 or your external IP if you're directly connected to the internet.

Spread the news!

You can stop Directory Opus from calling home and invalidating your certificate with the following commands (as administrator):

route -p add 67.228.213.247 mask 255.255.255.255 [yourinternalip]
route -p add 203.34.202.11 mask 255.255.255.255 [yourinternalip]

Replace [yourinternalip] with your local IP such as 192.168.1.2 or your external IP if you're directly connected to the internet.

Spread the news!

Batch file to create null-routes to prevent DOpus from calling home. NB: You will have to run this every time you obtain a new IP address (new wireless network, etc.)

Find it here: http://pastebin.com/Kzfr1KwN
@Lickalicious69: I bow for you man! you rule. Thank you thousand times!
